name: Introduction to Embedded Programming
desc: This PowerPoint provides a detailed overview of the entire hardware architecture from Cortex series CPUs to STM32 chips and development boards. Additionally, it elaborates extensively on the working process of microcontrollers, covering aspects such as data storage, instruction set, data manipulation, and information flow.

name: The work of electronic control
desc: The work of a qualified electrical control engineer and the knowledge and skills required for the job are introduced.

name: Programming Fundamentals
desc: The basics of programming are introduced, including an explanation of what programming is, and an overview of some fundamental components of C++ for beginners.

name: Data Types
desc: The commonly used data types and storage methods in C++ are introduced, along with some encoding knowledge.

name: Keywords
desc: The commonly used keywords in C++, their usage, and detailed examples are introduced.

name: Scope
desc: Introduced the important concepts of internal linkage and external linkage in C++, and with the help of these concepts, explained the purpose and difference between definition and declaration.
